4th single in Australia and New Zealand off Circus album

wiki.summary: 4th single in Australia and New Zealand off Circus album

track.name: Shattered Glass
comments: Along with Circus and Hold it Against Me, one of the few decent tracks that Dr. Luke ever produced.
THIS SHIT DESERVED TO BE A SINGLE! A masterpiece.
"quando eu escuto essa música e lace and leather me sinto uma vagabunda KKK" MORTAA KKKKKKKKKKK
One of the best tracks from "Circus"! <3
You're gonna want me back when your world falls apart like shattered glass
I just realized this is so OIDIA or BRITNEY material!
My face's gonna hunt you all the time. ♥
quando eu escuto essa música e lace and leather me sinto uma vagabunda KKK
